name: PHYAKH
description:
PHYAKH is a story-driven, action adventure combining exploration with fast-paced combat games. You’ll become PHYAKH, a creature who was saved from death in scientific laboratory in bio-robotic body and comeback to help his wife from under arrested by the army troop


Key Features

Explore brand new fantasy open-world maps

Collect the diamond pearls use as an extra energy source for his bio-robotic suit

Engage in Fast-Paced Combat

Choosing the right creatures with unique abilities to take down the Invader, army troops were scattered all over the planet.
Kotcha-weha for Simultaneous Combat Over the cloud

Phyakh for Simultaneous Combat On Ground continue to Underwater Fight

Sriha for Explore over the SuperNatural Environment
